oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drama -- Lebanon
Samuel Beckett -- Waiting for Godot
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The American University of Beirut, Civilization Sequence Program presents a dramatized playreading of "Waiting for Godot" by Samuel Beckett (act one only). Directed by Peter Shebaya; produced by David Kurani. April 9 [1979], West Hall Auditorium A. Students, Facullty & Community are all cordially invited.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Waiting for Godot
